alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Clark, northwestern Dallas and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richwoods, or near Arkadelphia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... Joan... Curtis... Dalark... Griffithtown... Manning... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 68 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
